item.description:
Jingle Bell, Jingle Bell, Jingle Bell Rock!

OK, time for the Christmas Pub Crawl - "The 12 Beers Of Christmas".

Here is the plan:
2.00pm Phoenix Landing
3.30pm The Field
5.00pm Tavern on the Square (Porter Square)
6.00pm Christopher's
7.30pm Spirit Bar
9.00pm The Burren

Notes...
Locations:
The Phoenix is a short walk from Central T. We'll also hop on the T between The Field and Tavern on the Square (note that this is the Porter Square location). The Burren is at Davis so easy again for the T.
The 90 mins at Christopher's will give time to (ch)eat.

T-shirts!
The T-shirts will be similar design to last year (tree front, pub listing and check-boxes on the back to record how many drinks you've had*.
If you want a T-Shirt, please send me a separate email with quantity and size by MONDAY NOV 8TH as I need to pay for them in advance. They'll be $18-$20 (if a lot of people buy a shirt, we could get it down to $15). The RSVP list is just to keep track of overall numbers, not T-shirts - everyone is welcome.

ID!
You will need you Mass drivers license or your passport. Some of the pubs are quite strict so please remember to bring this along or you won't get in.

Cheers,
Steve O.

(*drink responsibly...!)

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Christmas Pub Crawl - "The 12 Beers of Christmas"
